mapping.name: ${province_en}_QUALITYDETER_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.templet: 电信四期_质量劣化预警_LTE.ftl
mapping.sql: select '1.42.01b_SP0' as "版本号",'%%Y-%%M-%%D' as 时间戳, (SELECT DISTINCT C.PROVINCE_NAME FROM CFG_PROVINCE_CITY C WHERE C.CITY_NAME = t.city_name) AS "省份", city_name AS "地市", count(distinct t.reseau_no) AS "质量劣化网格数量", (select count(distinct reseau_no) from ne_taizhang_cell N WHERE N.City_Name = t.City_Name) AS "网格总数" from ne_taizhang_cell t, (SELECT distinct T1.NE_SYS_ID FROM (select NE_SYS_ID, Round((decode(SUM(P30111_2), 0, 0.0, SUM(P30111_1) / SUM(P30111_2))) * 100, 4) P30111, Round((decode(SUM(P33176_2), 0, 1.0, SUM(P33176_1) / SUM(P33176_2))) * 100, 4) P33176, Round((decode(SUM(P33207_2), 0, 0.0, SUM(P33207_1) / SUM(P33207_2))) * 100, 4) P33207, Round((decode(SUM(P34124_2), 0, 1.0, SUM(P34124_1) / SUM(P34124_2))) * 100, 4) P34124 from (select TB0.NE_SYS_ID, Round(((P2815_CM_RADIOFNUM)), 4) P30111_1, Round(((P2802_CMO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2802_CMO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2802_ACCPROBE_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2802_ACCPROBE_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2802_ACCHO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2802_ACCHO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2802_ASSIGNSOFT_CALLSUCCESSNU + P2802_ASSIGNSOFT_EXTINTERRUPTN + P2848_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2848_EXTINTERRUPTNUM) + (P2803_CMO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2803_CMO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2803_ACCPROBE_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2803_ACCPROBE_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2803_ACCHO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2803_ACCHO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2803_ASSIGNSOFT_CALLSUCCESSNU + P2803_ASSIGNSOFT_EXTINTERRUPTN + P2850_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2850_EXTINTERRUPTNUM)), 4) P30111_2, Round((P2802_CMO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2802_CMO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2802_ACCPROBE_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2802_ACCPROBE_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2802_ACCHO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2802_ACCHO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2848_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2848_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2803_CMO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2803_CMO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2803_ACCPROBE_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2803_ACCPROBE_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2803_ACCHO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2803_ACCHO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2803_ASSIGNSOFT_CALLSUCCESSNU + P2803_ASSIGNSOFT_EXTINTERRUPTN + P2833_ASSIGNSOFT_EXTINTERRUPTN + P2834_ASSIGNSOFT_CALLSUCCESSNU + P2834_ASSIGNSOFT_EXTINTERRUPTN + P2802_ASSIGNSOFT_CALLSUCCESSNU + P2802_ASSIGNSOFT_EXTINTERRUPTN + P2850_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2850_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2833_CMO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2833_CMO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2833_ACCPROBE_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2833_ACCPROBE_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2833_ACCHO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2833_ACCHO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2833_ASSIGNSOFT_CALLSUCCESSNU + P2834_CMO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2834_CMO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2834_ACCPROBE_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2834_ACCPROBE_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2834_ACCHO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2834_ACCHO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM), 4) P33176_1, Round((P2802_CMO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2802_CMO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2802_CMO_BLOCKFAILURENUM + P2802_CMO_OTHERFAILURENUM + P2802_ACCPROBE_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2802_ACCPROBE_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2802_ACCPROBE_BLOCKFAILURENUM + P2802_ACCPROBE_OTHERFAILURENUM + P2802_ACCHO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2802_ACCHO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2802_ACCHO_BLOCKFAILURENUM + P2802_ACCHO_OTHERFAILURENUM + P2802_ASSIGNSOFT_CALLSUCCESSNU + P2802_ASSIGNSOFT_EXTINTERRUPTN + P2802_ASSIGNSOFT_BLOCKFAILUREN + P2802_ASSIGNSOFT_OTHERFAILUREN + P2848_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2848_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2848_BLOCKFAILURENUM + P2848_OTHERFAILURENUM + P2803_CMO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2803_CMO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2803_CMO_BLOCKFAILURENUM + P2803_CMO_OTHERFAILURENUM + P2803_ACCPROBE_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2803_ACCPROBE_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2803_ACCPROBE_BLOCKFAILURENUM + P2803_ACCPROBE_OTHERFAILURENUM + P2803_ACCHO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2803_ACCHO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2803_ACCHO_BLOCKFAILURENUM + P2803_ACCHO_OTHERFAILURENUM + P2803_ASSIGNSOFT_CALLSUCCESSNU + P2803_ASSIGNSOFT_EXTINTERRUPTN + P2803_ASSIGNSOFT_BLOCKFAILUREN + P2803_ASSIGNSOFT_OTHERFAILUREN + P2850_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2850_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2850_BLOCKFAILURENUM + P2850_OTHERFAILURENUM + P2833_CMO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2833_CMO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2833_CMO_BLOCKFAILURENUM + P2833_ACCHO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2833_ACCHO_BLOCKFAILURENUM + P2833_ACCHO_OTHERFAILURENUM + P2833_ASSIGNSOFT_CALLSUCCESSNU + P2833_ASSIGNSOFT_EXTINTERRUPTN + P2833_ASSIGNSOFT_BLOCKFAILUREN + P2833_ASSIGNSOFT_OTHERFAILUREN + P2834_CMO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2834_CMO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2834_CMO_BLOCKFAILURENUM + P2834_CMO_OTHERFAILURENUM + P2834_ACCPROBE_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2834_ACCPROBE_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2834_ACCPROBE_BLOCKFAILURENUM + P2834_ACCPROBE_OTHERFAILURENUM + P2834_ACCHO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2834_ACCHO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2834_ACCHO_BLOCKFAILURENUM + P2834_ACCHO_OTHERFAILURENUM + P2834_ASSIGNSOFT_CALLSUCCESSNU + P2834_ASSIGNSOFT_EXTINTERRUPTN + P2834_ASSIGNSOFT_BLOCKFAILUREN), 4) P33176_2, Round((P803_AIRLINKLOSTDROPNUM + P803_HHODROPNUM + P803_OTHERDROPNUM), 4) P33207_1, Round((P803_AIRLINKLOSTDROPNUM + P803_HHODROPNUM + P803_OTHERDROPNUM + P803_RLSSNUM + P803_PDSNRELEASENUM), 4) P33207_2, Round((P801_MO_WIRENETCALLSUCNUM + P801_MT_WIRENETSUCNUM + P819_MO_WIRENETCALLSUCNUM + P819_MT_WIRENETSUCNUM), 4) P34124_1, Round((P801_CMO_CALLSNUM + P801_CMO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P801_CMO_BLOCKFNUM + P801_CMO_OTHERFNUM + P801_CMO_RTCHCAPFNUM + P801_CMO_TCCTIMEOUTFNUM + P819_CMO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P819_CMO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P819_CMO_BLOCKFAILURENUM + P819_CMO_OTHERFAILURENUM + P819_CMO_RTCHCAPFNUM + P819_CMO_TCCTIMEOUTFNUM + P801_CMT_CALLSNUM + P801_CMT_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P801_CMT_BLOCKFNUM + P801_CMT_OTHERFNUM + P801_CMT_RTCHCAPFNUM + P801_CMT_TCCTIMEOUTFNUM + P819_CMT_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P819_CMT_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P819_CMT_BLOCKFAILURENUM + P819_CMT_OTHERFAILURENUM + P819_CMT_RTCHCAPFNUM + P819_CMT_TCCTIMEOUTFNUM + P801_FMT_CALLSNUM + P801_FMT_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P801_FMT_BLOCKFNUM + P801_FMT_OTHERFNUM + P801_FMT_RTCHCAPFNUM + P801_FMT_TCCTIMEOUTFNUM + P819_FMT_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P819_FMT_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P819_FMT_BLOCKFAILURENUM + P819_FMT_OTHERFAILURENUM + P819_FMT_RTCHCAPFNUM + P819_FMT_TCCTIMEOUTFNUM), 4) P34124_2 from DS_COUNTER_GROUP_ZTE_TC_1X_1D TB0, DS_COUNTER_GROUP_ZTE_TC_DO_1D TB1 where (((TB0.START_TIME >= to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - 7 AND TB0.START_TIME <= to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - 1) and tb0.NE_SYS_ID = tb1.NE_SYS_ID and tb0.CITY_ID = tb1.CITY_ID and tb0.START_TIME = tb1.START_TIME)) union all select TB0.NE_SYS_ID, Round(((COUNTER_1157632969 + COUNTER_1157632970 + COUNTER_1157632971 + COUNTER_1157632972 + COUNTER_1157632973 + COUNTER_1157632974)), 4) P30111_1, Round(((COUNTER_1157628567 + COUNTER_1157628587) + (COUNTER_1157628568 + COUNTER_1157628588)), 4) P30111_2, Round(((COUNTER_1157628567 + COUNTER_1157628587 + COUNTER_1157628568 + COUNTER_1157628588 + COUNTER_1157632645 + COUNTER_1157632646)), 4) P33176_1, Round(((COUNTER_1157628553 + COUNTER_1157628573 + COUNTER_1157628554 + COUNTER_1157628574 + COUNTER_1157632642 + COUNTER_1157632641)), 4) P33176_2, Round((COUNTER_1157633261 + COUNTER_1157631124 + COUNTER_1157633260), 4) P33207_1, Round((COUNTER_1157633261 + COUNTER_1157631124 + COUNTER_1157633260 + COUNTER_1157633262), 4) P33207_2, Round((COUNTER_1157631249), 4) P34124_1, Round((COUNTER_1157631248), 4) P34124_2 from DS_COUNTER_GROUP_HW_TC_1X_1D TB0, DS_COUNTER_GROUP_HW_TC_DO_1D TB1 where (((TB0.START_TIME >= to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - 7 AND TB0.START_TIME <= to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D', 'yyyy-mm-dd') - 1) and tb0.NE_SYS_ID = tb1.NE_SYS_ID and tb0.CITY_ID = tb1.CITY_ID and tb0.START_TIME = tb1.START_TIME))) group by NE_SYS_ID) T1, (select NE_SYS_ID, Round((decode(SUM(P30111_2), 0, 0.0, SUM(P30111_1) / SUM(P30111_2))) * 100, 4) P30111, Round((decode(SUM(P33176_2), 0, 1.0, SUM(P33176_1) / SUM(P33176_2))) * 100, 4) P33176, Round((decode(SUM(P33207_2), 0, 0.0, SUM(P33207_1) / SUM(P33207_2))) * 100, 4) P33207, Round((decode(SUM(P34124_2), 0, 1.0, SUM(P34124_1) / SUM(P34124_2))) * 100, 4) P34124 from (select TB0.NE_SYS_ID, Round(((P2815_CM_RADIOFNUM)), 4) P30111_1, Round(((P2802_CMO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2802_CMO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2802_ACCPROBE_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2802_ACCPROBE_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2802_ACCHO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2802_ACCHO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2802_ASSIGNSOFT_CALLSUCCESSNU + P2802_ASSIGNSOFT_EXTINTERRUPTN + P2848_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2848_EXTINTERRUPTNUM) + (P2803_CMO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2803_CMO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2803_ACCPROBE_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2803_ACCPROBE_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2803_ACCHO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2803_ACCHO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2803_ASSIGNSOFT_CALLSUCCESSNU + P2803_ASSIGNSOFT_EXTINTERRUPTN + P2850_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2850_EXTINTERRUPTNUM)), 4) P30111_2, Round((P2802_CMO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2802_CMO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2802_ACCPROBE_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2802_ACCPROBE_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2802_ACCHO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2802_ACCHO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2848_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2848_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2803_CMO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2803_CMO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2803_ACCPROBE_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2834_ACCHO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM), 4) P33176_1, Round((P2802_CMO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2802_CMO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2802_CMO_BLOCKFAILURENUM + P2802_CMO_OTHERFAILURENUM + P2802_ACCPROBE_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2803_ACCPROBE_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2803_ACCPROBE_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P2803_ACCPROBE_BLOCKFAILURENUM + P2803_ACCPROBE_OTHERFAILURENUM + P2803_ACCHO_CALLSUCCESSNUM + P2803_ACCHO_EXTINTERRUPTNUM + P819_FMT_TCCTIMEOUTFNUM), 4) P34124_2 from DS_COUNTER_GROUP_ZTE_TC_1X_1D TB0, DS_COUNTER_GROUP_ZTE_TC_DO_1D TB1 where (((TB0.START_TIME >= to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TB0.START_TIME <= to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D', 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 6) and tb0.NE_SYS_ID = tb1.NE_SYS_ID and tb0.CITY_ID = tb1.CITY_ID and tb0.START_TIME = tb1.START_TIME)) union all select TB0.NE_SYS_ID, Round(((COUNTER_1157632969 + COUNTER_1157632970 + COUNTER_1157632971 + COUNTER_1157632972 + COUNTER_1157632973 + COUNTER_1157632974)), 4) P30111_1, Round(((COUNTER_1157628567 + COUNTER_1157628587) + (COUNTER_1157628568 + COUNTER_1157628588)), 4) P30111_2, Round(((COUNTER_1157628567 + COUNTER_1157628587 + COUNTER_1157628568 + COUNTER_1157628588 + COUNTER_1157632645 + COUNTER_1157632646)), 4) P33176_1, Round(((COUNTER_1157628553 + COUNTER_1157628573 + COUNTER_1157628554 + COUNTER_1157628574 + COUNTER_1157632642 + COUNTER_1157632641)), 4) P33176_2, Round((COUNTER_1157633261 + COUNTER_1157631124 + COUNTER_1157633260), 4) P33207_1, Round((COUNTER_1157633261 + COUNTER_1157631124 + COUNTER_1157633260 + COUNTER_1157633262), 4) P33207_2, Round((COUNTER_1157631249), 4) P34124_1, Round((COUNTER_1157631248), 4) P34124_2 from DS_COUNTER_GROUP_HW_TC_1X_1D TB0, DS_COUNTER_GROUP_HW_TC_DO_1D TB1 where (((TB0.START_TIME >= to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D', 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TB0.START_TIME <= to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D', 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 6) and tb0.NE_SYS_ID = tb1.NE_SYS_ID and tb0.CITY_ID = tb1.CITY_ID and tb0.START_TIME = tb1.START_TIME))) group by NE_SYS_ID) T2 WHERE T1.NE_SYS_ID = T2.NE_SYS_ID AND decode(T2.P30111, 0, 0, abs(T2.P30111 - T1.P30111) / T2.P30111 * 100) >= 10 AND decode(T2.P33176, 0, 0, abs(T2.P33176 - T1.P33176) / T2.P33176 * 100) >= 10 AND decode(T2.P33207, 0, 0, abs(T2.P33207 - T1.P33207) / T2.P33207 * 100) >= 10 AND decode(T2.P34124, 0, 0, abs(T2.P34124 - T1.P34124) / T2.P34124 * 100) >= 10) C where t.ne_sys_id = c.ne_sys_id group by t.city_name
